titleStmt.title: The third booke, declaring by examples out of auncient councels, fathers, and later writers, that it is time to beware of M. Iewel by Iohn Rastel ...
titleStmt.author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.

notesStmt.note: Leaves 118, 120 and 168 misnumbered as 120, 118 and 186 respectively.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
